CheckBoxStateListener Class Reference

#include <CheckBoxStateListener.h>

Inheritance diagram for CheckBoxStateListener:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A check box state to field activation listener is a special check box listener that toggles the active flag of a field according to the check box state.

See also:
Field::addCheckBoxStateListener()

Definition at line 20 of file CheckBoxStateListener.h.
